pages.title: Runic Snares
pages.text: Ok, what if I told you that you can pull resources out of thin air? Well you'd be be right, you can't pull them out of thin air. But you can out of the mana that's in the air. This process is called infusion and it requires a Catalyst to condense the particular materia you are looking for. Then it's just a matter of crafting what you need out of it.

To get yourself a Catalyst you'll need two things. Well three actually, but the last one is not gonna be a problem, you'll see. You'll need some Runic Snares and a Glass Dagger. First I'm gonna tell you about the snares.

When thrown into a creature they have chance to make them Frail. You will know when a creature is Frail because white particles will surround it. Then strike the creature while is still Frail to extract a Catalyst out of their soul. Be quick about it, the effect lasts from ten to twenty seconds.

But no ordinary sword will do. Glass Daggers, while not physically sharp, can reach deep within and extract the soul of a Frail mob. Plain Glass Daggers extremely brittle, while Mana Glass Daggers are unbreakable. Enchantments are not really useful if you think about it.
